languages.text: Увы, даже агентурная сеть почтенного Хейнрикса ван Калокса не смогла организовать тотального наблюдения за подданными колонии. Ему помешали активный саботаж со стороны подполья и некомпетентность слуг губернатора Вьятт, оказывавших поддержку операции. Уличных наблюдателей убивали, отчеты о надзоре исчезали, а следящие машины оказывались испорчены.

traits.locale_text: Увы, даже агентурная сеть почтенного Хейнрикса ван Калокса не смогла организовать тотального наблюдения за подданными колонии. Ему помешали активный саботаж со стороны подполья и некомпетентность слуг губернатора Вьятт, оказывавших поддержку операции. Уличных наблюдателей убивали, отчеты о надзоре исчезали, а следящие машины оказывались испорчены.

languages.text: Alas, the spy network of the esteemed Heinrix van Calox failed to capture all of the colony's subjects in its surveillance net. Its success was hampered by sabotage efforts by the rebels and the incompetence of Governor Vyatt's forces, who were assisting the operation. Agents on the ground were killed, surveillance reports went missing, and tracking devices were tampered with.

Ему помешали активный саботаж со стороны подполья и некомпетентность слуг губернатора Вьятт, оказывавших поддержку операции. Уличных наблюдателей убивали, отчеты о надзоре исчезали, а следящие машины оказывались испорчены.

Its success was hampered by sabotage efforts by the rebels and the incompetence of Governor Vyatt's forces, who were assisting the operation. Agents on the ground were killed, surveillance reports went missing, and tracking devices were tampered with.

Alas, the spy network of the esteemed Heinrix van Calox failed to capture all of the colony's subjects in its surveillance net. Its success was hampered by sabotage efforts by the rebels and the incompetence of Governor Vyatt's forces, who were assisting the operation. Agents on the ground were killed, surveillance reports went missing, and tracking devices were tampered with.

languages.text: その甲斐虚しく、誉れ高きハインリックス・ヴァン・カロックスの諜報網はコロニーの全ターゲットを捕らえるには至らなかった。反乱軍の妨害工作、そして本作戦を支援していた総督ビャット軍の能力不足のせいで成功に至らなかった。現場に配備された諜報員は殺害され、監視報告書は紛失した。追跡装置にも改ざんが施された。
languages.original_text: Alas, the spy network of the esteemed Heinrix van Calox failed to capture all of the colony's subjects in its surveillance net. Its success was hampered by sabotage efforts by the rebels and the incompetence of Governor Vyatt's forces, who were assisting the operation. Agents on the ground were killed, surveillance reports went missing, and tracking devices were tampered with.

traits.locale_text: その甲斐虚しく、誉れ高きハインリックス・ヴァン・カロックスの諜報網はコロニーの全ターゲットを捕らえるには至らなかった。反乱軍の妨害工作、そして本作戦を支援していた総督ビャット軍の能力不足のせいで成功に至らなかった。現場に配備された諜報員は殺害され、監視報告書は紛失した。追跡装置にも改ざんが施された。

languages.text: 遗憾的是，即使是备受尊敬的海因里希·冯·卡洛克斯的间谍网络，也未能将殖民地的所有臣民都纳入监视网。叛军不断进行破坏，维亚特总督的部队本该协助行动，但实际上却完全没有派上用场，导致监视行动未能顺利展开。地面特工被杀，监视报告丢失，追踪装置也遭到了篡改。
languages.original_text: Alas, the spy network of the esteemed Heinrix van Calox failed to capture all of the colony's subjects in its surveillance net. Its success was hampered by sabotage efforts by the rebels and the incompetence of Governor Vyatt's forces, who were assisting the operation. Agents on the ground were killed, surveillance reports went missing, and tracking devices were tampered with.

traits.locale_text: 遗憾的是，即使是备受尊敬的海因里希·冯·卡洛克斯的间谍网络，也未能将殖民地的所有臣民都纳入监视网。叛军不断进行破坏，维亚特总督的部队本该协助行动，但实际上却完全没有派上用场，导致监视行动未能顺利展开。地面特工被杀，监视报告丢失，追踪装置也遭到了篡改。

languages.text: Por desgracia, la red de espías del estimado Heinrix van Calox no logró capturar a todos los súbditos de la colonia con su despliegue de medios. Su éxito se vio impedido por la actuación de saboteadores rebeldes y la incompetencia de las tropas de la gobernadora Vyatt que colaboraban en la operación. Murieron varios agentes, se perdieron registros de vigilancia y se manipularon dispositivos de rastreo.
languages.original_text: Alas, the spy network of the esteemed Heinrix van Calox failed to capture all of the colony's subjects in its surveillance net. Its success was hampered by sabotage efforts by the rebels and the incompetence of Governor Vyatt's forces, who were assisting the operation. Agents on the ground were killed, surveillance reports went missing, and tracking devices were tampered with.

traits.locale_text: Por desgracia, la red de espías del estimado Heinrix van Calox no logró capturar a todos los súbditos de la colonia con su despliegue de medios. Su éxito se vio impedido por la actuación de saboteadores rebeldes y la incompetencia de las tropas de la gobernadora Vyatt que colaboraban en la operación. Murieron varios agentes, se perdieron registros de vigilancia y se manipularon dispositivos de rastreo.

languages.text: Leider konnte das Spionagenetzwerk des geschätzten Heinrix van Calox nicht alle Untertanen der Kolonie in seinem Überwachungsnetz erfassen. Der Erfolg wurde durch Sabotageakte der Rebellen und die Inkompetenz der Kräfte von Gouverneurin Vyatt geschmälert, die die Operation unterstützen sollten. Agenten wurden getötet, Beobachtungsberichte verschwanden, und Ortungsgeräte wurden deaktiviert.
languages.original_text: Alas, the spy network of the esteemed Heinrix van Calox failed to capture all of the colony's subjects in its surveillance net. Its success was hampered by sabotage efforts by the rebels and the incompetence of Governor Vyatt's forces, who were assisting the operation. Agents on the ground were killed, surveillance reports went missing, and tracking devices were tampered with.

traits.locale_text: Leider konnte das Spionagenetzwerk des geschätzten Heinrix van Calox nicht alle Untertanen der Kolonie in seinem Überwachungsnetz erfassen. Der Erfolg wurde durch Sabotageakte der Rebellen und die Inkompetenz der Kräfte von Gouverneurin Vyatt geschmälert, die die Operation unterstützen sollten. Agenten wurden getötet, Beobachtungsberichte verschwanden, und Ortungsgeräte wurden deaktiviert.

languages.text: Malheureusement, le réseau d'espions de l'estimé Heinrix van Calox se trouva dans l'incapacité de capturer tous les sujets de la colonie dans son orbite de surveillance. La réussite de son entreprise fut entravée par les sabotages des rebelles et l'incompétence des forces de la gouverneure Vyatt en soutien de l'opération. Des agents sur le terrain furent tués, des rapports de surveillance disparurent mystérieusement et des appareils de localisation furent trafiqués.
languages.original_text: Alas, the spy network of the esteemed Heinrix van Calox failed to capture all of the colony's subjects in its surveillance net. Its success was hampered by sabotage efforts by the rebels and the incompetence of Governor Vyatt's forces, who were assisting the operation. Agents on the ground were killed, surveillance reports went missing, and tracking devices were tampered with.

traits.locale_text: Malheureusement, le réseau d'espions de l'estimé Heinrix van Calox se trouva dans l'incapacité de capturer tous les sujets de la colonie dans son orbite de surveillance. La réussite de son entreprise fut entravée par les sabotages des rebelles et l'incompétence des forces de la gouverneure Vyatt en soutien de l'opération. Des agents sur le terrain furent tués, des rapports de surveillance disparurent mystérieusement et des appareils de localisation furent trafiqués.

languages.text: Ne yazık ki muhterem Heinrix van Calox'un casus ağı, koloninin tüm vatandaşlarını gözetim altına alma hususunda başarısız oldu. Bu başarısızlığa, isyancıların sabotaj girişimleri ve Vali Vyatt'ın kuvvetlerinin yetersizliği gibi etkenler neden oldu. Sahada bulunan casuslar hayatını kaybetti, gözetim raporları kayboldu ve takip cihazları kurcalanıp bozuldu.
languages.original_text: Alas, the spy network of the esteemed Heinrix van Calox failed to capture all of the colony's subjects in its surveillance net. Its success was hampered by sabotage efforts by the rebels and the incompetence of Governor Vyatt's forces, who were assisting the operation. Agents on the ground were killed, surveillance reports went missing, and tracking devices were tampered with.

traits.locale_text: Ne yazık ki muhterem Heinrix van Calox'un casus ağı, koloninin tüm vatandaşlarını gözetim altına alma hususunda başarısız oldu.
